title: SQLIS NOT NULL Keyword

metadata.description: Learn about SQLIS NOT NULL Keyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Reference

❯
IS NOT NULL
The
IS NOT NULL
command is used to test for 
non-empty values (NOT NULL values).
The following SQL lists all customers with a value in the "Address" field:
Example
SELECT CustomerName, ContactName, Address
FROM Customers
WHERE Address 
  IS NOT NULL;

Reference

❯
★
+1

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:
SELECT CustomerName, ContactName, Address
FROM Customers
WHERE Address 
  IS NOT NULL;
